subject: Basketball (College)
Height (Stature)
Basketball
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: The unbeaten Wildcats are not just taller over all than any other N.C.A.A. Division I team; they are taller than every N.B.A. team except the Minnesota Timberwolves.
snippet: The unbeaten Wildcats are not just taller over all than any other N.C.A.A. Division I team; they are taller than every N.B.A. team except the Minnesota Timberwolves.
